articles.title: Ngee Ann Poly lecturer under probe for allegedly making Islamophobic remarks, may be dismissed if warranted - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Ngee Ann Polytechnic is investigating an alumnus’ account of how a lecturer had made personal and derogatory remarks on Islam, and will not hesitate to take disciplinary action, which includes dismissing the lecturer.
